name: Local storage
description: Store data locally on the user's device.

conditions.name: On item set
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Set item' when the item has been written to local storage.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check for being set.

conditions.name: On item get
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Get item', when the item value is available.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check for being read.

conditions.name: On item removed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Remove item', after the item has been removed from local storage.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check for being removed.

conditions.name: On any item set
conditions.description: Triggered after any 'Set item' action when the item has been written to local storage.

conditions.name: On any item get
conditions.description: Triggered after any 'Get item' action when the item value is available.

conditions.name: On any item removed
conditions.description: Triggered after any 'Remove item' action after the item has been removed from local storage.

conditions.name: On item exists
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Check item exists' if the given item exists in storage.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check if exists.

conditions.name: On item missing
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Check item exists' if the given item does not exist in storage.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check if missing.

conditions.name: On storage cleared
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Clear storage', when local storage has finished being cleared.

conditions.name: On all key names loaded
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Get all key names', when the list of key names is ready.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered if any error occurs while accessing local storage.

conditions.name: Compare key
conditions.description: Compare the current key name in a trigger.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current key.

params.name: String
params.description: String to compare the current key to.

conditions.name: Compare value
conditions.description: Compare the current item value in a trigger.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current value.

params.name: Value
params.description: String or number to compare the current value to.

conditions.name: Is processing sets
conditions.description: True if currently processing any 'Set item' actions.

conditions.name: Is processing gets
conditions.description: True if currently processing any 'Get item' actions.

conditions.name: On all sets complete
conditions.description: Triggered after all currently outstanding 'Set item' actions complete.

conditions.name: On all gets complete
conditions.description: Triggered after all currently outstanding 'Get item' actions complete.

conditions.name: Is persistent
conditions.description: True if the browser has granted persistent storage permission.

actions.name: Set item
actions.description: Store a value in local storage, and trigger 'On item set' when done.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to associate the value with.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter the value to store.

actions.name: Get item
actions.description: Read a value from local storage, and trigger 'On item get' when ready.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to get the value for. 'On item get' will trigger when the value is ready.

actions.name: Remove item
actions.description: Remove an item from local storage, and trigger 'On item removed' when done.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to remove. 'On item removed' will trigger when done.

actions.name: Check item exists
actions.description: Check if an item exists in local storage, triggering 'On item exists' or 'On item missing'.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to check if exists.

actions.name: Clear storage
actions.description: Remove all items from local storage, and trigger 'On storage cleared' when done.

actions.name: Get all key names
actions.description: Request a list of all key names in local storage, and trigger 'On all key names loaded' when ready.

actions.name: Set binary item
actions.description: Store a Binary Data in local storage, and trigger 'On item set' when done.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to associate the value with.

params.name: Source
params.description: The Binary Data object to store.

actions.name: Get binary item
actions.description: Read a Binary Data from local storage, and trigger 'On item get' when ready.

params.name: Key
params.description: Enter the name of the key to get the value for. 'On item get' will trigger when the data is ready.

params.name: Destination
params.description: The Binary Data object load the value into.

actions.name: Request persistent storage
actions.description: Request permission to persist storage until an explicit user action to clear storage.

actions.name: Load memory from JSON
actions.description: When using in-memory storage, load the complete state of storage from a JSON string.
actions.display_text: Load in-memory storage from JSON string [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: JSON
params.description: A string of JSON data to load.

expressions.name: ItemValue
expressions.description: In 'On item get', the item value retrieved.

expressions.name: Key
expressions.description: The current key name in a storage trigger.

expressions.name: KeyCount
expressions.description: After 'On all key names loaded', the key count.

expressions.name: KeyAt
expressions.description: After 'On all key names loaded', the key name at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index

expressions.name: ErrorMessage
expressions.description: In 'On error', an error message if any available.

expressions.name: MemoryStorageAsJSON
expressions.description: When using in-memory storage, a JSON string representing all stored data.
